prestring:
You hide, while the demon extends its wrath on the surrounding farmland.
Just then, the earth shakes, and there rises the God of Judgement, Piwo.
In one swoop, he erases any trace that the demon even existed, and turns his eyes on you.
With the snap of his fingers, the sky tears open and summons the God of Lightning, Jan.
They do not tolarate immorality; prepare to die.
